contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Mammoth Spring, Arkansas |settlement_type = [[City]] |image_skyline = Mammoth Spring 010.jpg |imagesize = 250px |image_caption = Main Street |image_seal = |image_map = Fulton_County_Arkansas_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Mammoth_Spring_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location in [[Fulton County, Arkansas|Fulton County]] and the state of [[Arkansas]] |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |coordinates_region = US-AR |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[US state|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in Arkansas|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Arkansas]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Fulton County, Arkansas|Fulton]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 3.6 |area_total_sq_mi = 1.4 |area_land_km2 = 3.5 |area_land_sq_mi = 1.4 |area_water_km2 = 0.1 |area_water_sq_mi = 0 |elevation_ft = 528 |elevation_m = 161 |population_as_of = 2010 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 977 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = 318.6 |population_density_sq_mi = 819.3 |timezone = [[Central Time Zone (North America)|Central (CST)]] |utc_offset = -6 |coordinates_display = display=inline,title |latd = 36 |latm = 29 |lats = 36 |latNS = N |longd = 91 |longm = 32 |longs = 37 |longEW = W |timezone_DST = CDT |utc_offset_DST = -5 |postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] |postal_code = 72554 |area_code = [[Area code 870|870]] |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 05-43670 |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 0077585 |footnotes = |website = }} '''Mammoth Spring''' is a city in [[Fulton County, Arkansas|Fulton County]], [[Arkansas]], [[United States]]. The population was 977 at the [[2010 United States Census|2010 census]]. ==Geography== Mammoth Spring is located at {{coord|36.493268|-91.543577|type:city_region:US|format=dms|display=inline}}.{{GR|1}} According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the city has a total area of {{convert|1.4|sqmi|km2}}, of which {{convert|1.4|sqmi|km2}} is land and {{convert|0.04|sqmi|km2}} (2.86%) is water. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2010, there were 977 people, 460 households, and 350 families residing in the city. The [[population density]] was 847.1 people per square mile (328.0/km²). There were 593 housing units at an average density of 437.9 per square mile (169.6/km²). The racial makeup of the city was 96.4% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 0.9% [[Race (United States Census)|Black]] or [[Race (United States Census)|African American]], 0.5% [[Race (United States Census)|Native American]], 0.4% [[Race (United States Census)|Asian]], and 0.2% from two or more races. The percentage of the population of Hispanic or Latino of any race was 0.6%. There were 509 households out of which 28.1% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 55.6% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 11.2% had a female householder with no husband present, and 31.2% were non-families. 29.3% of all households were made up of individuals and 17.1% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.25 and the average family size was 2.75. In the city the population was spread out with 23.6% under the age of 18, 5.2% from 18 to 24, 23.4% from 25 to 44, 25.6% from 45 to 64, and 22.1% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 43 years. For every 100 females there were 85.3 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 82.1 males. The median income for a household in the city was $20,588, and the median income for a family was $26,438. Males had a median income of $18,750 versus $16,328 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the city was $12,487. About 13.6% of families and 19.3% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 24.3% of those under age 18 and 16.4% of those age 65 or over. ==See also== * [[Mammoth Spring]] ==References== <references /> ==External links== * [http://www.mammothspringar.com http://www.mammothspringar.com Mammoth Spring Chamber of Commerce] * [http://ozarkansassy.com/weather/ozark_weather.html Local Weather] {{Fulton County, Arkansas}} [[Category:Populated places in Fulton County, Arkansas]] [[Category:Cities in Arkansas]]
